title: TripX AI
introduction: Discover Your Perfect Getaway with Our Virtual Travel Assistant. Personalized travel itineraries tailored to your preferences and budget, with real-time support from our AI-powered travel assistant. Start planning your dream vacation now!
features: Real-time Recommendations: Leverage AI-driven insights to receive personalized travel plans. Chat in real-time with our virtual travel assistant for instant tweaks and updates.
Tailored Itineraries: Easily modify and manage your itinerary, from booking accommodations to adding activities, all within a few clicks.
Seamless Planning: Explore top-rated attractions, hidden gems, and must-try activities, all handpicked and updated in real-time based on your location.
targetPeople: Travelers looking for personalized and budget-friendly itineraries

faqs.question: What does this do?
faqs.answer: You choose a location where you'd like to visit & we give you an itinerary about your trip.

faqs.question: Can I get attractions suggestions based on price?
faqs.answer: Yes! We can tailor locations suggestions based on your budget, as well as food, attractions, etc.

faqs.question: Will I be able to save my itinerary?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can create a custom itinerary's and save them. Just make an account here.

faqs.question: Can you help me find a vacation?
faqs.answer: Yes! Select destinations from our lists or we can ask you a set of questions to help tailor your experience based on location, time, weather, affordability, attractions.
